Given the rationale of the cited provisions and the facts of the case as established beyond doubt during the proceedings , [ the Ministry ] considers that the first - instance authority was justified in rejecting the appellant ’s request for tax exemption ... As this is not the situation in the present case , given that the appellant , at the time of purchase [ of the house ] , owned a flat in GPE ... larger than the real property he was buying and in respect of which he sought tax exemption , it can not be said that by buying the house the appellant was purchasing his first real property in order to meet his housing needs . ”
